What is the significance of updating to Verus version v0.7.3-8?

Updating to Verus version v0.7.3-8 is mandatory to continue following the main chain. This update will re-enable full Verus Proof of Power, including staking, at a specific block height. It is essential to update before reaching that block height to avoid disruptions.
